long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Fuzzler Limited Chrome Extension allows the user to create a tailored wordlist off of the words present on a given webpage. It is a Chrome extension for penetration testing that creates tailored password lists by crawling a webpage and fuzzing each word according to specific rules (append/prepend digits 0-99, all uppercase, all lowercase, reversed word, and translated to 1337 speak). As a result, Fuzzler Limited can turn a wordlist of 1,342 words into a robust list of 94,108 words that are tailored for the specific webpage/organization.
